column6: "SECOND COMING", CHAPTER THIRTEEN The final battle begins here! It's X-Force's last stand in the future and the X-Men's last stand in the present. Bastion has been one step ahead of the X-Men the whole time, but one X-Man's sacrifice could turn the tide! Don't miss the penultimate chapter of the X-Event of 2010! Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Mike Choi | penciller:Adi Granov | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost
